
add_custom_command (
  OUTPUT  VAudioClockRegenPacket.cpp
          VAudioClockRegenPacket.h
          VAudioClockRegenPacket__Syms.cpp
          VAudioClockRegenPacket__Syms.h
  DEPENDS AudioClockRegenPacket.v
  COMMAND perl ${VERILATOR} ${VERILATOR_OPTS} -Mdir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR} -cc
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/AudioClockRegenPacket.v
)

# Verilog .v files are added here so that they get added to any IDE project generated by CMake.
add_library (VAudioClockRegenPacket STATIC VAudioClockRegenPacket.cpp VAudioClockRegenPacket__Syms.cpp
    AudioClockRegenPacket.v
)

target_compile_options(VAudioClockRegenPacket PRIVATE ${VK_CPPFLAGS})

target_include_directories(VAudioClockRegenPacket PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})

target_link_libraries(VAudioClockRegenPacket verilated)
